sentence: The Jan. 6 committee has issued six new subpoenas related to the push to appoint alternate electors,? including Arizona Republican Party Chair Kelli Ward, Pennsylvania Republican State Sen. Doug Mastriano, who is running for governor, and Arizona GOP Secretary of State candidate Mark FInchem.
title: In Ukraine, Biden faces a crisis with little political benefit back home

title: WaPo, "A Democrat in gym shorts tries to rally blue votes in Trump country"

author: Eric Lutz
title: Doug Mastrianos GOP Primary Victory Puts Democracy on the Ballot in Pennsylvania

sentence: In a last-minute endorsement that rattled members of Pennsylvanias Republican party, Trump backed Mastriano, a leading force in trying to overturn the 2020 election results who was pictured outside the Capitol on Jan. 6. There is no one in Pennsylvania who has done more, or fought harder, for Election Integrity than State Senator Doug Mastriano,? Trump said last week.
title: How Trump-backed candidates fared on the busiest primary day
